author: CBS News
title: Coronavirus updates: U.S. virus cases surpass 200,000
description: At least 4,470 people have died from the virus across the country.
content: Nurses are planning protests at 15 hospitals in six states this week against what they say is "a lack of preparedness" by HCA Healthcare, a major hospital chain in the United States. National Nurses United, one of the largest nurse's unions in the country, is… [+1264 chars]
